caption.center: LION INSURANCE COMPANY and Southeast Personnel Leasing, Appellants, v. STATE
of Florida, AGENCY FOR HEALTH CARE ADMINISTRATION and Orlando Regional

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from an order of the Agency for Health Care Administration.
opinion.attorneys:
Rayford H. Taylor of Stiles Taylor Grace, Atlanta, Georgia, for Appellants.
Justin M. Senior and Tracy Lee Cooper, Assistants General Counsel, Agency for Health Care Administration, Tallahassee, for Appellees.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED. Fairpay Solutions v. AHCA 969 So.2d 455 (Fla. 1st DCA 2007).
BARFIELD, VAN NORTWICK, and PADOVANO, JJ., concur.
